duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform physical examinations and preventive health measures as per physician's instructions.
Order, interpret, and evaluate diagnostic tests to assess patient's clinical problems.
Conduct various laboratory tests and record physical findings for patient care planning.
Prepare comprehensive patient care plans and recommend drugs or other treatment procedures.
Counsel and advise patients on maintaining a healthy lifestyle and substance abuse prevention.
Participate in quality improvement plans and perform other duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Master’s Degree or higher from accredited Nursing program, Alabama CRNP Licensure, and two years of Primary Care or Clinical experience
